alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Eddy Plains; Lea (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 17 at 1:07PM MST until January 18 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WINDY AND DRY CONDITIONS WITH VERY HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO AND MOST OF THE PERMIAN BASIN... * AFFECTED AREA...Gaines, Dawson, Borden, Scurry, Andrews, Martin, Howard, Mitchell, Loving, Winkler, Ector, Midland, Glasscock, Ward, Chaves Plains, Eddy Plains and Lea. * TIMING...Tuesday afternoon through early Tuesday evening. * WINDS...West 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * RFTI...3 or near critical.
info.instruction: Fires can start from the smallest of flames or sparks and are highly discouraged. Observe local burn bans.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Eddy Plains; Lea
